_comment: Gemini CLI MCP Configuration Template for SDL-MCP

_documentation.purpose: Configure SDL-MCP as an MCP server for Gemini CLI
_documentation.placement: Add to Gemini MCP servers configuration file

windowsNotes.paths: Gemini CLI expects forward slashes (/) or escaped backslashes (\\)
windowsNotes.npx: npx is cross-platform. Use 'sdl-mcp' for global install
windowsNotes.environment: SDL_CONFIG or SDL_CONFIG_PATH required for configuration

quoting.powershell: Use single quotes for literal paths, double quotes with $ for variables
quoting.cmd: Double quotes only; cmd does not support single quotes for strings

workspaceFolder.description: Gemini CLI replaces ${workspaceFolder} with workspace root
workspaceFolder.windows: Always resolves to forward-slash normalized path

cmd.rule: Always use double quotes for paths

powershell.rule: Single quotes for literals, double quotes with $var for expansion

_troubleshooting.permission_denied: Check file permissions for config and database
_troubleshooting.path_resolution: Verify workspaceFolder is set correctly in Gemini CLI
